synopsis.text: Asuka Ken and a motley crew of novice pilots find themselves as humanity's last hope in a world that has grown weary of the endless conflict against the Dark Ones. After years of service, the iconic giant robot Atlanger, a beloved plastic model series since 1975, is set to be decommissioned. However, when Earth is unexpectedly assaulted, Atlanger is thrust back into action. With its timeless appeal among middle-aged fans, witness the legendary robot's triumphant return in this thrilling OVA that premiered at Comiket 81 between December 29-31.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
